choose.when: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TOP) VALUES (#{NOTICE_ID}, #{NOTICE_NO}, #{NOTICE_TITLE}, #{NOTICE_CONTENT}, #{NOTICE_DATE}, 'U003', #{NOTICE_TOP});
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, ADMIN_ID) VALUES (#{NOTICE_ID}, #{NOTICE_NO}, #{NOTICE_TITLE}, #{NOTICE_CONTENT}, #{NOTICE_DATE}, 'U003');

mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND NOTICE_TOP = 'YES' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

choose.otherwise: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{NOTICE_TITLE}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{NOTICE_CONTENT}, WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{NOTICE_NO}
